title: Fish fingers with banana zambos ceviche
ingredients: 2 cups of banana ceviche finely crushed
instructions: Step 1. In a food processor we place the previously cooked fish
Step 2. The onions, coriander, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Let us process until we have a paste.
Step 3. Form the fingers and go through the flour, egg and crushed crumb of zambos. Then fry and serve.
Step 4. You can accompany with a tartar sauce or enjoy an omelet and lemon.
